description: Try our easy to follow Blackmores Single Origin Cacao and Coconut Balls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Blackmores Single Origin Cacao and Coconut Balls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5 cup dried dates, soak in warm water for 10 minutes and drain
0.33 cup Blackmores Single Origin Cacao + Nature Boost Prebiotics and Probiotics

recipeInstructions.text: If using whole almonds pulse in a food processor until it forms a meal.
Continue to add all of the ingredients and mix in your food processor until well combined and forms a dough.
Shape into balls and roll in additional coconut.
Put in the fridge for two hours or more before serving
